name: stem2fname
description: Determines the full filename with extension for a given file stem by checking various formats.

inputs.description: The stem of the file (without extension).
inputs.name: File stem

output-files.description: Full filename with the detected format. Format could be one of mgh, mgz, nii, nii.gz, bhdr, img, or w.
output-files.name: Output file

author: FreeSurfer Developers
